channel.title: CVE Feed for Pootlepress -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pootlepress -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-37948|2024-08-02T04:04:24.180Z -- pootlepress -- caxton%20%E2%80%93%20create%20pro%20page%20layouts%20in%20gutenberg
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PootlePress Caxton – Create Pro page layouts in Gutenberg allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Caxton – Create Pro page layouts in Gutenberg: from n/a through 1.30.1.
